articles.title: WATCH: NASA’s Mars Helicopter ‘Ingenuity’ Opens Its Blades, Gets Ready For Its Maiden Flight On The Red Planet - EurAsian Times
articles.description: NASA’s Mars Ingenuity 'helicopter' opened its blades on Thursday in anticipation of its first flight, which is scheduled for April 11. The robotic helicopter is a technology demonstration to test powered flight on another world for the first time, the US spac…
articles.content: NASAs Mars helicopter ‘Ingenuity’ opened its blades on Thursday in anticipation of its first flight, which is scheduled for April 11. The robotic helicopter is a technology demonstration to test powe… [+3028 chars]

articles.title: Korea's Krafton, maker of PUBG video game, seeks preliminary nod for IPO - DealStreetAsia
articles.description: Over-the-counter trades on Thursday valued Krafton at $17.92 billion.
articles.content: South Korea’s Krafton Inc, the video game holding company that publishes the blockbuster game PlayerUnknown’s Battlegrounds (PUBG), has applied for preliminary approval for an initial public offering… [+1526 chars]

articles.author: Genevieve Sarah Loh
articles.title: Singapore's Chin Han on becoming Mortal Kombat's Shang Tsung - CNA
articles.description: Singapore’s only Hollywood blockbuster star talks to CNA Lifestyle about saying yes to an iconic role and being part of an authentically diverse Asian cast.
